text: Caterpie (Rare), Weedle (Rare), Pidgey (Common), Rattata (Common) [Item: Chilan Berry], Nidoran (Female) (Uncommon), Nidoran (Male) (Uncommon), Oddish (Uncommon) [Item: Absorb Bulb], and Bellsprout (Uncommon) [Item: Big Root]
